ygData.messageBody:
I wish!

Actually Im a precocious lvl 27 unable to power level worth a darn. :) I am also a master smith, baker, swimmer, and halfway there on Tailoring and Fletching. I just like knowledge.

Now if I could just get my Research to go up and get something to wear besides silk...

--Shannyn of Tunare server
